memory_monitor

private MemoryMonitor memory_monitor
Panel containing the memory state information. Also a thread constantly making memory measurements.

chunk_loader

private ChunkLoaderThread chunk_loader
Thread object used for monitoring the state of the chunk loading thread. Necessary for restarting the thread when loading a new map.

loaded_file

private java.io.File loaded_file
Reference to the loaded file used by the export function to be able to save the last loaded file.

public void log(java.lang.String msg)
Main log method. Adds the string to the log at the bottom of the window.

Parameters:

populateLoadList

private void populateLoadList()
Runs the populate list thread.

getMinecraftDir

public static java.io.File getMinecraftDir()
Gets the directory that Minecraft keeps its save files in. It works on all systems that Minecraft 1.2 works in.

Returns:
path to the Minecraft dir
